Meat Representation monster Bastani A delicious monster
In Persian, bastani means ice cream.
In 2016, the idea of a mobile ice cream shop with strange ice creams was created by an entrepreneur named Vafa Tabibian on a piece of paper, and a year later, with all the difficulties and difficulties ahead, with the help of his loyal friend in a small kiosk on wheels named “Vafakoo” Ice cream was provided. By participating in specialized exhibitions and festivals, with a very impressive reception from the people, he achieved great success, A delicious monster
In Persian, bastani means ice cream.
In 2016, the idea of a mobile ice cream shop with strange ice creams was created by an entrepreneur named Vafa Tabibian on a piece of paper, and a year later, with all the difficulties and difficulties ahead, with the help of his loyal friend in a small kiosk on wheels named “Vafakoo” Ice cream was provided. By participating in specialized exhibitions and festivals, with a very impressive reception from the people, he achieved great success, which he was able to transform and modernize his brand with a new name in 2020 after the corona pandemic era. Monster Bastani™ change and upgrade.
Today Monster Bastani® is competing as an international brand in the global market and owes this position to your great support. Monster Bastani® continues with perseverance and determination with the goal of growing its family without stopping on the path of progress in expanding and upgrading products and will continue on the path it started. which he was able to transform and modernize his brand with a new name in 2020 after the corona pandemic era. Monster Bastani™ change and upgrade.
Today Monster Bastani® is competing as an international brand in the global market and owes this position to your great support. Monster Bastani® continues with perseverance and determination with the goal of growing its family without stopping on the path of progress in expanding and upgrading products and will continue on the path it started.
